title:
Using SlowFast Networks for Near-Miss Incident Analysis in Dashcam
  Videos
authors: Yucheng Zhang, Koichi Emura, Eiji Watanabe
abstract:
This paper classifies near-miss traffic videos using the SlowFast deep neural
network that mimics the characteristics of the slow and fast visual information
processed by two different streams from the M (Magnocellular) and P
(Parvocellular) cells of the human brain. The approach significantly improves
the accuracy of the traffic near-miss video analysis and presents insights into
human visual perception in traffic scenarios. Moreover, it contributes to
traffic safety enhancements and provides novel perspectives on the potential
cognitive errors in traffic accidents.
